## VertexArray class


**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class VertexArray 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(options)](./toygl.vertexarray._constructor_.md) |  | Create a vertex array, which defines the attributes making up a vertex, and contains an optional index buffer to select vertices for rendering. Attributes are defined using object literals as shown in Example 1 below. |
